text: Police allege Eric Allen Kirkpatrick, 61, opened fire at a Vancouver office Christmas party Friday, killing one man. Const. Tim Fanning told a news conference today a man walked into the party with a firearm and shot one person dead immediately. Police have identified the victim as Benjamin David Banky, 40, of Vancouver. Twelve other people managed to leave the office while police began two hours of negotiations with a suspect. Fanning says the incident was extremely traumatic for witnesses.
title: A Vancouver man has been charged with first-degree murder after a killing at an office party.
